TEXT.TITLE: ENVIRONMENTAL <POWER.O> BOARDMEMBER RESIGNS
TEXT.BODY: Environmental Power Corp said that Robert W. Baldridge has resigned from its board of directors, effective June 17. Environmental develops, owns and operates small power production, hydropower, and waste-energy plants. Reuter
